1077370.name: Vrerience - Fear of Flying
1077370.description: Fear of flying is a fear of being on a flying vehicle during flight. This program allows the user to experience a flight on a passenger plane and get used to the different phases of a flight. The therapist controls when the plane takes off and lands, as well as the amount of turbulence. There is also a teleport button that immediately places the plane back on the landing strip without first going through the landing sequence.
1077370.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
